channel.title: Mysterious cape at varrock museum
channel.description:
hy guys, does aynone from you know how i can add requirements to the object mysterious cape at varrock museum to get comp cape ?
:)

item.title: Mysterious cape at varrock museum
item.dc:creator: @chasemortier chasemortier
item.description:
@chasemortier wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:7, topic:459053”]Add this in actionhandler: (Replace objectid with the object id, and itemid with completionist cape id)

case objectid: if(c.playerLevel[0] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[1] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[2] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[3] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[4] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[5] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[6] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[7] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[8] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[9] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[10] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[11] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[12] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[13] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[14] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[15] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[16] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[17] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[18] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[19] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[20] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[21] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[22] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[23] >= 98) { c.getItems().addItem(itemid, 1); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3212, 3428, 0);//moves to varrock square change coords to whatever c.sendMessage("Come back when you have achieved maxed stats!"); } break;[/quote]omg tysm!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Mysterious cape at varrock museum
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Add this in actionhandler: (Replace objectid with the object id, and itemid with completionist cape id)

case objectid: if(c.playerLevel[0] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[1] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[2] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[3] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[4] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[5] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[6] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[7] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[8] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[9] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[10] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[11] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[12] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[13] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[14] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[15] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[16] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[17] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[18] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[19] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[20] >= 99 && c.playerLevel[21] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[22] >= 98 && c.playerLevel[23] >= 98) { c.getItems().addItem(itemid, 1); } else { c.getPA().movePlayer(3212, 3428, 0);//moves to varrock square change coords to whatever c.sendMessage("Come back when you have achieved maxed stats!"); } break;

Read full topic

[quote author=mr extremez link=topic=561961.msg4098365#msg4098365 date=1347136998]
Can you try to re explain I’m not sure what you mean.
[/quote]well i dont speak good english lol
but what i mean is the object (mysterious cape) is to get completionist cape and i want to add requirements to the object like real rs
check this video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ip4-Ze863q8
and when you have unlocked all the requirements that you can obainted the completionist cape

srry for my bad english
[/quote]So do you mean there is an object that gives it that has requirments. Or do you just mean you want the cape to have reqs?[/quote]the first one that youd said thats what i mean
